XComSender
SendersEndpoint
XCom client voor het versturen van files via XCom.
See also
Github - XComSender Implementation Examples
Javadoc - org.frankframework.xcom.XComSender
Syntax
Copy
<XComSender workingDirName=""/>
Attributes
Required
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
workingDirName	text	-
Directory in which to run the xcomtcp command
Optional
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
fileOption	options	-
One of create, append or replace
Available Options: CREATE, APPEND, REPLACE
remoteDirectory	text	-
Remote directory is prefixed witht the remote file
carriageflag	options	-
Available Options: YES, VLR, VLR2, MPACK, XPACK, NO
codeflag	options	-
Characterset conversion
Available Options: EBCDIC, ASCII
compress	options	-
Available Options: YES, COMPACT, LZLARGE, LZMEDIUM, LZSMALL, RLE, NO
logfile	text	-
Name of logfile for xcomtcp to be used
password	text	-
Password of user o
